entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0180.10154] The company has included the concept DividendsPayableAmountPerShare as a parenthetical disclosure using the group 100080 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Partners' Capital (Unaudited) (Parenthetical). This is a an instant item and does not reflect the dividends applicable for the reporting period. Filers should use the element CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared with the appropriate reporting period instead of the concept DividendsPayableAmountPerShare. The rule will only report an error if a value has been reported for the element DividendsPayableAmountPerShare.
The value(s) reported are 0.368, 0.364, 0.37, 0.364
Period :2024-03-31 Unit : USD/shares
Rule Element Id:10154 Rule version: 26.0.9 - ghi-20240630.htm 1696
